values:
Check out my new journal at www.crazylife.org/users/eternal_peace

Gracias Mucho.

1.) April 30, 2004 -- i disappointed my parents ... i wish i could change the past

2.) April 25, 2003 -- will broke up with me ... it sucked, but oh well... worse things have happened to me.

3-5... still waiting

i never thought anything could be worse that will breaking up with me... (yea i know, give me a break) but then i hear the few words from my parents that changed everything: "i'm so disappointed in you."

well i was just talking to my mom and i told her that i knew someone who was going to military school and i'd probably never see him again. and she just had to lay the little 2 year thing on me.  in 2 years my friends and i are all going our seperate ways and i really didn't want to be reminded of that because i have great friends and so i was being a freaking baby and started to cry because i didn't want to think about what might or might not happen in the 2 years to come. i'm just trying to live in the present because i've always had a problem of living in the past or dreaming of the future. and i'm sick of it because who's to know what's supposed to happen in the future. i finally have a group of friends who actually understand me.. and i wouldn't give them up for anything. but i really want to go to college. i want to major in art therapy. (oh yea go art) but i love my friends! and they're so important to me. i dunno anymore. i just dont want to have to say goodbye.. TO ANYONE!!!!! and so this is to the person who is going to military school: we may not know each other very well, but i know you well enough to be upset that you're leaving. and i know you'll probably never read this, but do you see that stopping me from writing? uh no. but ... i'll miss you. who am i supposed to have the little "hello" contests with. i'll win this one though cuz, i'm not going to say goodbye. i'm not going to put myself through all of that sobbing, i'll miss you crap, cuz i'm not going to say goodbye. THERE IS NO GOOD IN GOODBYE! jesus. later days.

today was eventful. i don't feel like going through all of it though because some of it is to depressing to relive again... but the best news of the day: CAM AND MARIA are back together. congrats maria for having the guts to stand up to cam and tell him ... ahem... stuff. i wish i had the courage after will broke up with me. eh oh well... i'm sick of living in the past. time to face the realities of life... which suck so much. well some of it anyways... i'm just trying to focus on my schoolwork and friends and family. i'm sick of feeling stressed when i have nothing to be stressed about it... yup makes no sense... but try living my life for a day. that would stress you out too... i try hard to hide behind the sarcastic remarks.. yea. anyways... i'm going to act like a total girl for a minute because well first of all... i broke a fucking nail! yup after trying so hard to grow them out and then one of them broke. eh oh well... things could be worse. and second of all... i feel sorta lonely or something. i don't even know. it's like i feel something... i'm just not sure what it is. i'm just the type of girl who always thinks she needs an extra person in her life.. (read between the lines.. i'm talking about a boyfriend) but in actuallity... my friends are so much better than a guy. ahem no offence... ahem.

but i don't know... i think that maybe i just feel stressed or something because of some other UNexciting news i was encountered with during school. something that i don't want to talk about because i don't want to hurt anyone by reveiling something they might not want anyone to know.

later days.

Not only am I listening a cd that makes me think too much... (Gravity by Our Lady Peace) but recently, I started to listen to a lot of Spoken Word Poetry from OPRFHS. and I listened to a poem that Dan Sullivan wrote and I used one of the lines from his poem to write a poem of my own. and this is the poem:

Put a Quarter In the Slot

The words are ringing throughout my mind:

"Put A Quarter in the Slot."

Take a chance.

But what's left to take a chance on

after you feel as though you've lost everything.

So I stand here

Wit my quarter

hovering over the slot

getting ready to take the chance.

Then you remember...

When you felt so insecure

you looked to a person

of the opposite sex

hoping maybe they'd bring

out all your insecurities.

But all they did in the end

was hurt you even more.

Add more insecurities,

and lower your self-esteem.

So with your quarter

in your hand

which hovers beneath the slot,

you think

should you risk getting hurt again

or walk away with your head to the floor

because you were too much

of a coward.

Then you remember again,

when you met someone who you thought mattered to you,

and who said he loved you.

But in actuality,

he was just using you to get to your friend.

That was a risk

you weren't ready for.

But are you ready

to put the quarter

in the slot this time...

But of course,

you start to think too much yet again.

About when your best friend

told you she admired you

for having the guts to take a risk.

So as you stand there

with your trembling hand

over the slot, you think

should I let those guys know

they got the best of me,

or should I let my bestfriend know that what she thinks

matters to me.

Without another thought

you dropped the quarter in the slot

and walked away

with your head held high.

And turned only once

when you heard

Cha-Ching!

as the title said... i have nothing better to do than sit here and pretend something is going to happen. i have had two bad days (the past two days) starting on monday with julie and josh and claire and nate.  julie was doing the usual and letting people walk all over and talk bad about her, and i finally snapped because that is the one and only thing i can't stand about julie... so i finally snapped at her about it which caused me to snap at everyone else in the room at the time. so i ended up snapping at claire, josh, and nate. but josh and nate deserved it because they were being jackasses... (the truth hurts, trust me) and then julie and i talked about it and imagine this... JULIE... one of the sweetest people i know, JULIE... someone who would give you the shirt of her back, JULIE... who would never hurt a soul... JULIE... told me she is so used to people walking all over her that she doesnt even fucking notice it anymore. how the hell would you feel if someone treated you like.. and not just someone.. but your own friends... wow. anyways, i talked to julie about it and we have a... i guess an understanding. but she will never understand how pissed i get when i see her let people treat her like shit. julie is my bestfriend and i will never let someone treat her like that ever again.. not if i have something to do with it.

then today.. since i was still pissed from last night... i snapped at people... the first person i snapped at was my mom and she threatened to not take me anywhere today because i was supposed to hang out with josh (he's an asshole, but then again he's a guy.. damn "that was a treat"),claire, and julie...

today i had a sudden realization or lack there of, whatever... i felt like they were leaving me out of their plans, like they have done to other people they don't want to be friends with anymore. i have been up for a long time , just sittnig and reading a book until one of them called me.. when i finally decided to call julie... josh and claire were at her house... funnily enough.. like they always say "hey corri i was just about to call you" WHO THE FUCK DO YOU TAKE ME FOR... yea right... they are signalling me out just like they did with cristina.. i guess the three of them are supposed to go on and do better things and just hang out together.. JUST THE THREE OF THEM... 

or maybe i'm just trying to push them away because i'm afraid they know me to well. i'm afraid that they don't like what they see in me so i'm pushing them away so they don't have to put up with my shit... but in actuallity.. i'm hoping that they want to.. i'm hoping that they see a true friend in me.. but who the hell knows anymore?

i had a good weekend.  on friday, i went out to dinner and to see a movie with julie, josh, claire, and katie. we went to cozzi's corner.  i ordered mostacholi (or however you might spell it) and everyone started to eat off my plate. it was really funny.  but maybe you had to be there. and then we went to see jersey girl (this was my second time seeing it) .. it's a funny movie. the best part is when jeniffer lopez dies.  haha... seriously though. jason lee and matt damon make an appearence in it.. it was amusing.. so does will smith.  george carlin is in it... who else... well ben affleck of course.. yea.. anyways. it was a good movie.

then on saturday, i went to claire's house along with julie and josh and we watched the faculty follies which josh had on tape, and newscene.. (something claire was in) and it was funny.  then we all went our separate ways. then at 6:30ish my mom drove me to the river forest community center where i was meeting up with josh and julie to attend a best buddies dance.  when we first walked in, josh and i felt totally out of place because we didn't know anyone, but julie knew some people.  but it turned out to be better than we thought it would be.  josh had to do a  project for newscene... so i was helping him out with that by taping a lot of things.

yea... that was pointless.

Speechless, heartbroken, confused, the few words in which explain a teenage girl such as myself.  Emotional, pissed, pained.  There's a few more.  I have so many questions to ask, but no one who seems to know the answer.  No one who seems to care what the questions are.  I smile to hide the pain, but maybe I'm just too emotional, but that's a given.  No one sees the tears of a girl who pretends to be happy.  I'm speechless because I don't know what to say, I'm surprised, hurt, pissed. So many adjectives to explain a girl like me, but none of them add up to how I'm feeling right about now.  I don't know what to think.  Maybe my eyes were playing tricks on me.  Maybe I didn't actually see what I thought I saw.  I don't know why someone I'm so close to would have done something like this to me.

Recently I began to think more than usual... about everything; where my choosen path will lead me, the future, the past, the present.  And the most painful of all... change.  Why am I letting something so important to me change who I am? I can't even tell if it's changing me for the better or for the worse.  I'm so afraid of changing to many things and then later regretting it.  I've already had enough regrets to last me a lifetime... but they just keep on coming, appearing as if out of nowhere.  I don't know, I wish I could explain everything I'm feeling in some sort of art.  I want to draw, or paint, or do something that means something to someone.  Do you know that feeling of when you meet a really great friend, and you feel like your whole life is complete; I want to paint that feeling... but I can't. I'm afraid to.  No one understands me right now... I don't even understand myself. But maybe if I were able to express myself on canvas, or paper, more than I have before... maybe someone would actually understand me; or maybe I would understand myself.  But at this point, that just seems impossible to do.

yesterday was fun. i went out to dinner with claire, katie, and josh. then we went to an ice show at ridgeland commons... the ice show starts out with little kids and goes up to teenagers, but it stops at seniors. but anyways... so there were 2 guest skaters that skated in the ice show the year before. but they had gradulated and went off to college. anyways. they were a couple and they skated and the guy held onto the girl's ankle and swung her around in the air. and then he let her head hit the ice on accident. when she stood up... you could tell she was a little light headed and she stumbled a little (and no she was not drunk) and then she skated slowly off the ice. so yea. but it looked like it hurt. but i had a lot of fun. josh and claire kept flirting but that's what josh does with all his friends that are girls and it was funny. yea...

you know what, i'm so sick of "dancing around these big words" and pretending that i'm not being hurt. i'm so sick of it. more than anything i want to be able to tell you to your face why i'm acting the way i am.  but i bet you wouldnt be able to care less because you're way to self inflicted that you wouldn't care how the things you're doing are hurting someone else.  i want to be able to be what everyone wants me to be but i'm afraid that i still won't add up to everyone's idea of perfection. i'm afraid that i'm going to continue making the same mistakes and hurting the same people and doing the same shit as i have been doing. but why the hell am i so hurt by it? why do i care so much? it has nothing to do with me.  it's because i wish i still had the friendship with you that we had during the summer, but we're just too different and i don't want us to be.  i want to be able to fit your idea and everyone's idea of a perfect friend. but i can't because everyone's idea is so different.  i want to stick with the people that love me for me and not because of who i hang around with because i know you think my friends are pathetic because you're always making fun of them... julie, she's blonde.. you say that all the time... who the fuck cares what color her hair is, what matters is that she's more of a friend than you ever were or ever will be able to be. she  loves me for me, she doesn't make me feel like shit... my friendship is enough for her that she doesn't have to try and be friends with a sibling because she can trust me with anything... julie is the person that makes me feel like i'm good enough. but i don't deserve her friendship. josh, you always say he's so gay. what the hell is wrong with you.  how would you feel if someone looked at you and was so fucking prejudice that they said oh he's a selfish druggie.  what the hell is wrong with you. my friends.. the ones that have been at my side through out it all... since i first came into high school.. they care about me and don't judge my other friends. but you, you inconsiderate, heartless bastard... you're too busy getting high that you could give a shit what i or anyone else thought.  and for once, i'm not even going to try and be your friend. not anymore. i'm sick of your shit and i'm not going to put up with it.  i'm not going to say i wish i never met you. because that's untrue, i'm happy i met you and i'm happy we were friends because you taught me about life and the people it brings in and right back out again.. because you were one of them. you're not the only doing wrong... that's not what i'm saying... because i know i have a bad attitude and i know that i'm over sensitive over emotional, whatever the hell you want to call it.. i don't give a shit. but at least i don't judge your friends. and at least i never made you feel inferior towards me. i know i take things too seriously sometimes and i'm working on that and i bet that's one of the reasons why our friendship no longer exists. i remember that one time during the summer, when we were hanging out and then you walked home and i told you to call me to make sure you got home ok. after about a half an hour i called to see what was going on and you told me you were reading a note you recieved from your dad. don't you remember when you used to be able to talk to me about that? i miss being able to talk to you.  but we're too different now. you'd rather be in desplaines with your friends there than trying to "recreate" whatever we did or didn't have. and i'm not asking for a friendship because at this point, that's the last fucking thing i want. but you asked me why i was mad... those are the reasons. happy? there are probably so many more things i want to say, but i'll just be repeating the same things in a different text, so i'll leave it at that. take it how you want it.  who gives a shit.

You're the pain in my stomach,
You're the Subject of my thought,
You're the reason I cry myself to sleep everynight.
I'm
too busy thinking
of how things were.
I'm 
too busy 
wishing you were still in my life.
I'm 
too busy 
crying to notice you don't care.

I'm
too self inflicted,
I'm to upset to care,
I'm too selfish 
to listen to your side.

You're the pain in my stomach
which twists and turns
at my dreams.
You're the subject of my thought
which brings back memories.
You're different, I'm different.

Things have changed
and yet,
I still write about all the pain
you caused me
hoping that someday
you'll actually care
more than I do now.

You're the pain in my stomach
You're the subject of my thought,
You're the reason I cry myself 
to sleep everynight

Too bad some things don't change.

i had a good weekend.  it started off on saturday when i had a small get-together at my house... it was me, josh, julie, katie, and claire.  it was a lot of fun.  i took a lot of pictures cuz we were watching grease and at every song, they would start dancing so i took pictures.. lol.  and then on sunday, i went to lake street with julie, josh, and katie.  which was also fun.  we went to coconuts and i bought two cd's for half the price of one. but yea i had fun... 

anyways... i haven't written in here in a while.. nothing interesting has really been going on in my life... eh.  yea.... i'm bored.

i'm stuck in the library until 9:40 today... i don't have a final until 10:10... history. the only final i've been really worried about... it's my worst subject.  

julie isn't here this time, she's actually taking her history final right now.. lucky her. gag...

oh and guess who just happens to be in the library also? yep, the ex.  eh oh well.. i don't care.  

there's nothing to talk about!!! grrr..

i have a song stuck in my  head..."Sic Transit Glory" by Brand New... i love that song.  their new cd "Deja Entendu" is on my to buy list.  eh...

i'm sitting in the oprfhs library right now. finals started today... but i don't have one til 12ish or something to that affect.  so i'm sitting here emailing back and forth with julie cuz we're not allowed to talk. it's funny though.  i have 2 finals i have to study for tomorrow... oh joy.  my english-lit final and my spanish final.  i have to write 3 essays for my english-lit final.  the first one is about the short story called "the red dress" and then another one about high fidelity and another about a short story we wrote in class last week.  

anyways... i might be getting my hair cut today.  i'm getting it cut to the base of my neck.  wow... random. 

[;;

well i'm going to go look for quotes or something....

instead, i'm a dumb red head... hehe. i died my hair. 

i've wanted to dye it red for the longest time and i finally got to...

yay

last night was a lot of fun.  i went skating at ridgeland commons which i haven't done since last year when i went with will.  but i was with josh, julie, claire, katie, and this girl ashley who i'm not a big fan of.  anyways, julie, katie and i put in a joint effort to corner josh and push him over. it was like dominos cuz then julie fell herself, and then claire came over to see what was going on cuz all she saw was julie and josh laughing while sitting on the ice. and then josh pushed her down. so yea.

i didn't the stupidest thing thursday night. one of my favorite shows is on thursday and it's julie's too, so when it ended i went to call her and i dialed the first number i could think of, which was will's... not julie's.  and will and i don't talk anymore because after he broke up with me he said he just wanted to be friends and then a week later he said he didn't want to be friends with me anymore and i asked why and he said "cuz i don't like you and you annoy me" and that was the last thing i ever heard from him. anyways, about me calling him instead of julie.  he picked up, either that or it was his little brother, but anyways... i said "hi is julie there" without even realizing it and he said "who?" and then i got another call so i looked down at the caller id and it said macino, j... (julie's last name) and so i put my ear back up to the phone and he hung up so i did too and then i told julie the whole story and we still laugh about it.  it was embarrasing, but it was also funny.

by Something Corporate

It's been a bad day,
another bad day and all I want to do is look at you and know I'm okay.
From where I'm sitting these shoes ain't fitting and I'm walking backwards,
looking down, don't see the sky I see the ground. 

Above
below you look and so you wonder,
where the time has gone of looking up, tomorrows on its way.
Above
below you look and so you say,
when I wake up in the morning is it 'gonna be another ugly day? 

She sits in church its 2 pm and look whose back from work again.
I guess they thought your better off, without this life, without a job.
From where I'm sitting these shoes ain't fitting and I'm going nowhere,
killing time, just trying to feed my bleeding mind. 

It's been a bad day,
another bad day and I cross my heart and hope to die
these dreams of yours are 'gonna fly.

happy new year everyone, even though mine may not be up there at the top of the list.  ditched again at the beginning of another year.  last year none of my friends could hang out with me and this year is the same.  i'm not exactly blaming anyone, just kinda upset that no one is available yet again.  although at the beginning of last year, i had a boyfriend. that dipshit will.  oh well.. i'll live.  although julie was over yesterday and her sister, lindsey, and her sister's boyfriend, charlie, came to pick her up and started making out in front of me which was first of all very ignorant considering dominique was also in the room and second of all, just reminds me how lonely i really am.  i don't need happy couples to remind me. 

anyways.. while i'm on this self pitty thing, i'll change the subject.

i painted another picture today.  it was a self portrait.  it scared kara... haha that was fun.  well maybe i should stop pittying myself and join the party...

later. happy new year everyone.

Your element is Earth. I hate to say it but you are
down to earth. Stubborn and loyal. You tend to
want to nurture others and you are the one
person friends always come to for awnsers.
Without people like you others would be flying
over the edge because, whether you know it or
not you keep a steady beat to your life and
will end up where you want to in the end. There
is a sureness about you that is hard to match
that draws people to you. No matter what
happens the Earth keeps turning.

be optomistic, idealistic, and curious, but

yourself, and can come off a bit conceited, but
it's just a mask to hide your lack of
experience.

I've come to the conclusion with my attitude. (with the help of Kara and mom): I want people to have the same opinon on things as I do.  For example, I hate anything that is drug related but if I just don't accept people for who thy are, even for the flaws... then I shouldn't deserve to have friends.  Everyone has flaws, and some people have more than others.  But I  need to accept peope for who they are and not what I want them to be.  No one is perfect.
I know I get mad way to easily... sometimes-most of the time.  So my mom and I came up with a word that would make me laugh or smile so I don't have time to be mad.  So, it's working so far, I haven't really gotten mad at anyone.
My mom knows why I get more mad and pissed at Cullum than I do anyone else.  Because he's moving... and I'm trying to get myself to hate him so I'm not so upset when he's gone.  But I shouldn't leave our friendship on a bad note.  My mom told me that the one person that pisses her off more than anyone is my dad and it's because she cares so much about him.  So who knows, maybe that's why I fight with Cullum.  I just need to learn to chill.  I'm just the kinda person that wears her felings on her sleeve and gets pissed when no one bothers to notice. And that's so stupid.  And I know it is, which is why I'm changing some things about myself that I don't like.
yea... that's all.

"Don't hold onto things, it will only bring you pain."

"It's not important to know what everybody else seems to know.  I don't care how much they laugh at me."

I don't know, I'm not mad, I'm not upset, I don't know what I am.  I feel something, I know I feel something I just don't know what.  I just... need to get my mind off of everything, I don't even know what I have to get my mind off of... I just need to.  It's probably all those fights with friends that I had this past month... they're still bothering me and I know they shouldn't be because it's all in the past.  It's just that something else is bothering me and I can feel it in the pit of my soul (i know it sounds cheezy, but shut up)but I don't know what it is.  I'm just so sick of feeling the way I do.  Like I have to be careful what I say around certain people so that no one will think I'm an idiot, or no one will think that I'm stupid or something. 
Maybe I'm just being stupid and pathetic right now, but I don't know but something is just not right.  I bet I'm really confusing everyone right now, but just imagine being in my shoes right now (size 9ish in womens)... I don't know what to feel, I don't know what to think, I don't know what to say, I don't know what to do, I just feel like I have to do something or everything will get fucked up.  Don't ask me what everything is, It's just how I'm feeling right now.  Maybe it's just this whole attitude thing biting me in the ass. (it hurt)  I'm trying to change my attitude because it really needs to be changed... I mean seriously, I fought with Cullum a lot this past month, and it was all those stupid things that Julie does too but it doesn't piss me off when she does it... yep, Cullum, you were right... you know what I'm talking about. (you might not though) but... I don't know, so I'm working on changing my attitude.  The reasons why are:
*The Cullum fights are stupid and pathetic
*Everytime Bobby comes here, he thinks I'm pissed at something
*I'm sick of losing friends
*I need to...
Yea... I think this is the reason why I paint and draw... I have no clue how I feel, but when I put it all out onto paper not using words, I feel how the piece of artwork shows.  I may not be much of an artist, but I like to think I am.  I think that I try to hard to make everyone like me as me... so I hide the real me occasionaly just so that the real me won't show.  I(OCCASIONALY) think that if I don't hide the real me, then more people will run from me or try to distance themself from me.  And I'm tired of trying to hide the real me.
